articles.description: Consumption of fuel, a proxy for oil demand, rises by more than 5 per cent.
articles.content:
BENGALURU: Indias fuel demand hit its highest level in at least 24 years in February, data showed on Thursday, with industrial activity in Asias third biggest economy boosted by cheap Russian oil.
